title: New: Elvis Depressedly – Daughter Of A Cop / A Bible In A Bath of Bleach
content:
Having reversed his initial decision to kill Coma Cinema, the moniker under which he originally made his name, Mat Cothran made it clear that there would be some major changes coming relating to his side-project Elvis Depressedly.

Now having tweaked his two EPs into one single release, and made it available through iTunes, Cothran has stayed true to his word by releasing a couple more free tracks. Recorded for Glamour Kills Clothing, the four track GLMR KLLS EP is available for free via their official website.

Daughter Of A Cop is a delicate, folk inspired number, with Mat’s usual drawl and stunning lyrical ability allowing the track to develop a unique personality. A Bible In A Bath of Bleach uses a similar beat, but slightly sped up, and is very Coma Cinema-esque in nature, not a bad thing of course. Check out A Bible In A Bath Of Bleach below, and grab the three track EP for free here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
